resources.string: This app is brought to you by Orange
To find out more visit our website :
Thank you for using Smart SMS Controller
We hope you liked the app
To rate the app visit our website :
Press the button below to seek for Updates
Sorry, but updates needs an Internet connection
Sorry, but the server is temporarily unavailable
Click a feature to identify it.
Would you like to keep SSC running on background ?
Send me phone number on boot

Universal Format :
Country Code + Phone Number 
Example : 
+216 12 345 678 For Tunisia
Do you really want to delete
Sorry, but statistics needs an Internet connection
Sorry, but updates needs an Internet connection
[DSC ~] $wait to get terminal in the next version
error has occurred during identifying, this identifier is used by
[DSC Number Catcher]\nThis number is using your Smartphone.
Sorry, but this feature needs an Internet connection ..
Find out more apps made by Ammar Achraf ..

Smart SMS Controller was developed by I DEVELOP. This application helps you to control your Android Device by a simple SMS.. You can control it whenever you feel like and wherever you are. Droid SMS Controller gives the choice to rename your functions as your own choice using the Manager. SSC is a smart application, it can helps to control your device from distance. With SSC you won\'t suffer any more from distance.

I DEVELOP is a virtual Development group, we have been developing android apps since 2011. Our main purpose is to make from using Android Devices a fun, a confort and a win of time.. We develop also web sites, softwares and animated ads. We are doing our best to make from our virtual group a well known company.

string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item:
Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to call you. 
Syntax :
call me
Description :\nThis function helps you to order your android device to delete the inbox. \nSyntax :\delete inbox

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to delete the call log. 
Syntax :
delete call log

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to call you. 
Syntax :
make call NUMBER 
Example :
make call 123456789

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to change the mode. 
Syntax :\mode MODE
MODE : 
S for silent 
G for general 
V for vibrent mode 
Example :
mode S

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to read a contact and send you his number. 
Syntax :
send me contact CONTACT NAME 
Example :
send me contact Ammar Achraf

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to send you the last 5 messages. 
Syntax :
send me last messages

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to send you his curent location. 
Syntax :
send me location

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to send you all the informations about him self. 
Syntax :
send me informations

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to send an SMS to a specific phone number. 
Syntax :
send sms to PHONE NUMBER , SMS BODY
Example :
send sms to 123456789 , Hello

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to send you the last 10 actions from the call log's database. 
Syntax :
send me call log

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to create and save a new contact. 
Syntax :
save contact PHONE NUMBER , CONTACT NAME

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to send you the time. 
Syntax :
send me time

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to send you the date. 
Syntax :
send me date

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to play a sound. 
Syntax :
play sound

Description :
This function helps you to order your android device to vibrate. 
Syntax :
vibrate
